channel.title: Project Slapicton (ZepsityV2)
channel.description:
[size=36pt]Very ugly work so this project is dead please close[/size]
[ul][center][IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/einvdh.png[/img]
[U]Development Team[/U] Artesia/Purple Frost/Me(All my site names)
Revision: 317 - PI Base: Zepsity
[SIZE=3][U]Key[/U][/SIZE] Normal color: Not Started Yellow: 1%-50% Started Orange: 51%-99% Green: 100% Finished
[U][SIZE=4]Information:[/SIZE][/U] [SIZE=2]This is going to be a new version of Zepsity. This is basically going to be v2 of that. I changed the name as I did not like that name before and the new name is a lot better in my view. The forums will be released on here once most stuff is started etc... so that I can get some beta testers... The first 10 signed up on forums will get the beta tester client etc... Once finished testing and devoloping the server will be released to see how far it goes.[/SIZE][/center]
[SIZE=4]Combat System[/SIZE] Servers Combat Systems
Melee Information [list] [li]Hitting and Defense Damage[/li] [li]Melee Weapon Speeds[/li] [li]Correct Melee Formula[/li] [li]Correct Special GFX and Anim[/li] [li]Weapon Requirements[/li] [/list]
Range Information [list] [li]Hitting and Defense Damage[/li] [li]Range Weapon Speeds[/li] [li]Correct Range Formula[/li] [li]Using Correct Arrows[/li] [li]Correct Special GFX and Anim[/li] [li]Weapon Requirements[/li] [/list]
Magic Information [list] [li]Hitting and Defense Damage[/li] [li]Magic Weapon Speeds[/li] [li]Correct Magic Formula[/li] [li]Correct Spells Using Correct Runes[/li] [li]Correct Special GFX and Anim[/li] [li]Weapon Requirements[/li] [/list]
[SIZE=4]Skills[/SIZE] Skills being Re-Done
Runecrafting [list] [li]Correct Rune Support[/li] [li]Correct Rune Multiplication [/li] [/list]
Agility [list] [li]Courses[/li] [li]Correct Course Animations and GFX[/li] [li]Fixed Bugs[/li] [/list]
Summonig [list] [li]Re-Done Creating Followers[/li] [li]Correct Npc Pouches[/li] [li]Summoning vs Npc[/li] [li]Summoning vs Player[/li] [/list]
Dungeoneering [list] [li]Random Item On Join[/li] [li]No Bugs[/li] [li]Deleting Items on teleport[/li] [li]TeamSuppoer(Maybe)[/li] [li]Changing Rooms(Maybe)[/li] [li]Exp and Point System(Based on how much you do)[/li] [/list]
Slayer [list] [li]Level Based Tasks[/li] [li]Correct Npc Id to tasks[/li] [li]Correct Exp Formulas[/li] [/list]
Herblore and Farming [list] [li]Seeds into Herb[/li] [li]Raking and Water growth[/li] [li]Correct Potion Mixing[/li] [li]Seed Level compared to Herblore Level[/li] [li]More than 1 item to make potion[/li] [/list]
Mining and Smithing [list] [li]Correct Smith Interface[/li] [li]Correct Rune Prospecting[/li] [li]Level to Ore[/li] [li]Level to Creation[/li] [/list]
[SIZE=4]Teleports[/SIZE] [list] [li]SpellBook Teleports to Cities[/li] [li]Glory to Correct Locations[/li] [li]Dungeon Entrances and Correct Objects Inside[/li] [li]Correct Dungeon Traveling[/li] [li]Bosses through new item interface[/li] [li]Teletabs, Glory, Ring of Wealth, Ring of Dueling, etc... To travel[/li] [/list]
[SIZE=4]Minigames[/SIZE] Minigames
Pest Control [list] [li]Npcs attacking Npcs(try)[/li] [li]Timed at regular rate[/li] [li]Point and Cash back system[/li] [/list]
FireCape [list] [li]Correct Spawning Waves[/li] [li]Correct Jad Healing[/li] [li]Jad Spawning[/li] [/list]
Warriors Guild [list] [li]Correct Token to Drop Ratio[/li] [li]Correct Mathematical Point Getting[/li] [/list]
Barrows [list] [li]Killcount Ratio to Chest[/li] [li]Killcount Getting[/li] [li]Barrows in tunnels[/li] [/list]
Assualt [list] [li]5 Waves[/li] [li]Killing Npc to Complete[/li] [li]Certain Roles[/li] [li]Boss Wave[/li] [li]Points base on activity and level[/li] [/list]
Quests [list] [li]5 Custom Quests[/li] [li]Quest Support[/li] [li]Requirements[/li] [/list]
[SIZE=4]Media[/SIZE]
Pictures: [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/11aeoeh.png[/img] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/10qyqdf.png[/img] [IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2lasglc.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/98t3px.png[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/207svt2.png[/img]
[SIZE=4]Update Log[/SIZE] Updates: [list] [li]Date: 10-15-2011 - Cleaned entire base[/li] [li]Date: 10-15-2011 - Client Sided Tabs / Switching Re-Done[/li] [li]Date: 10-15-2011 - Re-Did and added new better interfaces[/li] [li]Date: 10-15-2011 - Moved home and Re-Did shops[/li] [li]Date: 10-15-2011 - Started on Weapon Requirments[/li] [li]Date: 10-17-2011 - New Agility Course 1/3 Done[/li] [li]Date: 10-18-2011 - New Agility Course 1/2 Done[/li] [li]Date: 10-18-2011 - Teleporting Interface 1/3 Done[/li] [li]Date: 10-20-2011 - Player Information Interface[/li] [li]Date: 10-20-2011 - New Agility Course 2/3 Done[/li] [li]Date: 10-21-2011 - SkillTab Re-Done and Fixed[/li] [li]Date: 10-21-2011 - Welcome and Rules Interface[/li] [li]Date: 10-21-2011 - Teleporting Methods 3/4 Done[/li] [li]Date: 10-21-2011 - Farming Patch Into Herbs[/li] [li]Date: 10-21-2011 - Fixed Magic on Npcs[/li] [li]Date: 10-21-2011 - Player Information Interface 3/4 Done[/li] [li]Date: 10-21-2011 - Quest Point System Added Like Old Rs[/li] [li]Date: 10-21-2011 - Need more than 1 item to make potions![/li] [li]Date: 10-22-2011 - Finished herblore potion making[/li] [li]Date: 10-22-2011 - Finished Brimhaven Dungeon 100%[/li] [li]Date: 10-22-2011 - Farming seeds[/li] [li]Date: 10-23-2011 - Account Security System[/li] [li]Date: 10-24-2011 - Rune Essence through mining[/li] [li]Date: 10-24-2011 - Farming Seeds chaos druis[/li] [li]Date: 10-24-2011 - Cleared up player save[/li] [li]Date: 10-24-2011 - Account Security System - Finished[/li] [li]Date: 10-24-2011 - Runecrafting needs talsman[/li] [li]Date: 10-24-2011 - Runecrafting about finished[/li] [li]Date: 10-25-2011 - Item Requirments[/li] [li]Date: 10-25-2011 - Specials Gfx and Ainims[/li] [li]Date: 10-25-2011 - NPC Drops[/li] [li]Date: 10-25-2011 - Teleporting thru glory and new system[/li] [li]Date: 10-27-2011 - Teleporting finished[/li] [li]Date: 10-27-2011 - Npc Drops are 90% Done[/li] [li]Date: 10-27-2011 - Agility Course is 95% Done[/li] [li]Date: 10-27-2011 - Mining is 95% Done[/li] [li]Date: 10-27-2011 - Smithing is Finished[/li] [li]Date: 10-27-2011 - Slayer Tasks have been Re-Done[/li] [li]Date: 10-28-2011 - Assault area found and started[/li] [li]Date: 10-29-2011 - Wasnt home all day D:[/li] [li]Date: 10-29-2011 - About 15 new monsters and bosses started[/li] [li]Date: 10-31-2011 - Started on Quest 1 and 2 got them near finished[/li] [li]Date: 10-31-2011 - New monsters started on animations[/li] [li]Date: 10-31-2011 - Herblore with seeds to farming started[/li] [li]Date: 11-2-2011 - Colored Robins and SoL's added[/li] [li]Date: 11-2-2011 - Pest Control new shop Interface- Started[/li] [li]Date: 11-5-2011 - Pest Control Shop Donep..[/li] [li]Date: 12-19-2011 - A few waves complete for Assault; Level: Easy[/li] [li]Date: 12-20-2011 - Fixed 2 of 3 memory leaks[/li] [li]Date: 12-27-2011 - Melee combat damaging has been tweaked[/li] [li]Date: 12-29-2011 - Range and Magic combat damaging has been tweaked[/li] [li]Date: 12-30-2011 - Jad is now working correctly on spawning some waves added[/li][/list]
Players and Others: Suggestions: Key: Y means yes, N means no, M means maybe, C more likely
Loveandpower Sug. St. C-tree farming with timers C-herblore takes secondary ingredients -- USED! Y-colored items such as robins etc can be aquired via a unique trading system in which you would trade in your regular robin for the colored robin after so many slayer tasks have been done Y-advanced clue scrolls M-finish adding a sprite for that fullscreen Y-creating a command so where we can see who is on Loveandpower Sug. En.
Support Images[/ul] [code][IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2mms0v6.png[/img][/code] [ul][IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2mms0v6.png[/img][/ul]
